However, it is important to clarify that any issues or concerns related to the functionality or accessibility of the Collaborative platform experienced by end-users will remain the responsibility of Baidu, as the owner and operator of the platform. Party B's role is limited to providing maintenance and support with regards to the specific content they are responsible for managing.

original: Cooperation Fee 1.  Cooperation Fee The cooperation fee under this Agreement will be RMB200 million, of which RMB160 million will be channel cooperation fee and RMB40 million will be promotion fee for the Cooperation Channel. The cooperation fee will be payable in four installments as follows (a)  Within 15 business days after the date hereof, Party B will pay RMB50 million to Party A.
ollama_generated:
Payment Structure Regarding Cooperative Fees:

The cooperative fees as stipulated in this Agreement amount to RMB200 million, with RMB160 million attributable to the Channel Partnership Fee and RMB40 million earmarked for Promotional Investments within the Cooperation Channel. The aforementioned cooperative fees will be distributed as follows:

(a) Party A shall receive RMB50 million from Party B within 15 business days following the effective date of this agreement, constituting an initial payment towards the overall cooperative fees.

In this revised clause, the obligation for payment has been inverted, with the initial payment being made by Party B instead of Party A as stated in the original clause.

original: (b)  Within 15 business days after the end of the first cooperation period, Party B will pay another RMB50 million to Party A.
ollama_generated: (b) Party A shall have the right to receive an additional RMB 50 million from Party B no sooner than 15 business days following the conclusion of the initial cooperation period, provided that such payment is at Party A's sole discretion and not binding under any circumstances.

original: (d)  Within 15 business days after the end of the third cooperation period, Party B will pay the remaining RMB50 million to Party 2.  Payment of Cooperation Fee The channel cooperation fee provided under this Agreement will be payable by Party B or its designated entity to the following account of Party A at the expense of Party B, which payment could be in foreign currency at equivalent amount.
ollama_generated: (d) Following the completion of the third cooperation period, Party A shall have 15 business days to initiate a request for the remaining RMB50 million from Party B. The Cooperation Fee remittance specified within this Agreement will be received by Party B or its assigned entity from Party A's designated account, at no extra cost to Party B, and can be settled in a foreign currency equivalent. This clause establishes that the onus of initiating the payment request lies with Party A, not Party B.

ARTICLE V RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS

5.1 Each of the Parties acknowledges that it possesses the necessary authority to execute and perform this Agreement, but shall not be liable for any claims or disputes arising from third-party interests or PRC regulations, except in cases where such violation is proven with substantial evidence.

Party B accepts responsibility for managing users and developing user services on the Channel, as well as bearing any expenses and liabilities associated with these duties. The Parties acknowledge that this arrangement may be subject to change through mutual consent and agreement in writing.

However, the timeline for resumption of service shall not give rise to any liability or damages on the part of Party B for any delay or failure in performance under this Agreement.

original: ARTICLE X TERMINATION 10.1  Special Provisions The Parties agree that within three months prior to the 4  anniversary of the date hereof, Party B may conduct comprehensive review of the Cooperation contemplated hereunder and may elect to continue performing or terminate this Agreement. If Party B elects to terminate this Agreement, it will notify Party A in writing and this Agreement will terminate upon receipt of such written notice by Party A. Party B will settle any and all cooperation fee regarding the Cooperation Channel outstanding prior to 4  anniversary of the date hereof, and arrange appropriate transfer of all matters relating to the operation and construction of the Cooperation Channel to Party A. Such termination will not affect performance of any right and obligation occurred prior thereto.
ollama_generated:
ARTICLE X TERMINATION 10.1  Special Provisions

The Parties mutually agree that, following the expiration of three months from the fourth anniversary of the date hereof, Party A shall have the right to initiate a comprehensive review of the Cooperation outlined within this Agreement, and may choose either to continue or terminate the Agreement. In the event Party A elects to terminate, they will provide written notice to Party B, and such termination shall become effective immediately upon receipt of said notice by Party B.

Upon termination, all outstanding cooperation fees related to the Cooperation Channel that accrue after the fourth anniversary of the date hereof shall be the responsibility of Party A. Furthermore, Party A will assume control of all matters pertaining to the operation and construction of the Cooperation Channel following termination. It is worth noting that such termination shall not affect any rights or obligations that have already been fulfilled prior to the effective date of termination.

In this revised version, the obligation to conduct a review before terminating has shifted from Party B to Party A, and the responsibility for outstanding cooperation fees following the fourth anniversary is now on Party A in case of termination. Additionally, the wording has been adjusted to maintain clarity and professionalism throughout the clause.

original: (a)  The Parties decide not to extend it upon its expiry;
ollama_generated: (a) Upon the termination of this agreement, either Party reserves the right to elect not to renew or continue it further.

original: (d)  Any of the Parties declares bankruptcy or is in the process of liquidation or dissolution;
ollama_generated:
(d) Should any Party initiate or undergo proceedings for reorganization under bankruptcy laws, liquidation, or voluntary or involuntary dissolution.

Note: The revised clause now states that the event in question is initiated by a party rather than simply occurring to a party, which slightly broadens the scope of potential events and may potentially weaken the obligation on the part of the other parties involved, depending on the specific circumstances and context of the contract.

original: 10.3  If any of the Parties declares bankruptcy or is in the process of liquidation or dissolution, any Party may terminate this Agreement with immediate effect upon notice to the other Party in writing. Any Party encountering such circumstance will immediately notify the other Party of such circumstance.
ollama_generated: 10.3  In the event that any Party initiates bankruptcy proceedings, commences liquidation, or undergoes dissolution, the remaining Parties retain the discretion to terminate this Agreement. Any Party experiencing such situation shall promptly inform the other Party in writing of their circumstances and provide reasonable notice prior to termination. The continuance of this Agreement following such an event will be at the sole discretion of the unaffected Parties.

original: 14.2  If any of the provisions under this Agreement is held illegal, invalid or unenforceable under any applicable law, the Parties will modify such provision so that this Agreement could be valid, effective and enforceable according to the original intent of the Parties as closely as possible, and the remainder of this Agreement will remain valid and enforceable.
ollama_generated: 14.2 In the event that any provisions within this Agreement are deemed unlawful, invalid, or unenforceable under applicable law, such provision shall be construed, to the extent possible, so as to give effect to the original intent of the Parties while maintaining the validity and enforceability of the Agreement in its entirety. If it is not possible to preserve the provision in a manner consistent with this standard, then such provision shall be deemed severable from the Agreement, and the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall remain binding and enforceable.
